However, it was not possible to avoid a marriage that had already been decided. Eventually, one day, when she was forced to prepare to marry the terrifying Northern Grand Duke,

Estelle met a handsome man who was as warm and friendly as the sun. Handsome face, sweet personality. The skin burned brown as if the sun kissed him. If the word romantic becomes a person, it would be like him.

â€˜How nice would it be to marry a man like this?â€™

A sigh came out automatically. After breaking up with the man, she had to prepare for a wedding to become the wife of a scary person who she didnâ€™t even know his face.

Just in time, her eyes met the man who was looking at her. The man smiled playfully at her with friendly black eyes. Estelleâ€™s face turned red and bowed her head. There was nothing to ask him in a hurry, so she quickly pulled out what she had in mind.

â€œCome to think of it, what brought you to the capital?â€

He closed his mouth for a moment and puffed his cheeks slightly. He seemed to hold back his laughter.
